20-018SC.summary: Emails received for the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, September 24, 2020.REGULAR AGENDA1.

20-014SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting held Thursday, August 27, 2020.A motion was made by Vice Chair Wheeler, seconded by Commissioner Dillon, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Rey Gonzales, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 4 - Hilda Gaytan, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock and Alan Tolkoff2.

20-015SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Long Beach Airport on progress towards an Airport Sustainability PlanCommissioner Tolkoff joined the meeting.Ryan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation. Chair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Skye spoke.Ryan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer, spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Ryan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Ryan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer.Vice Chair Wheeler spoke.Page 2 of 7HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 24, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESRyan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Wheeler and Ryan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer.Chair Coffee spoke.Ryan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer, spoke.Kate Kuykendall, Public Affairs Officer, spoke.A dialogue ensued among Chair Coffee, Ryan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer, and Kate Kuykendall, Public Affairs Officer.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Ryan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Ryan McMullan, Noise Compliance Officer.A motion was made by Commissioner Gonzales, seconded by Vice Chair Wheeler, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Rey Gonzales, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeAbsent: 3 - Hilda Gaytan, Jenny Novak and Eric Rock3.

20-016SC.summary: Recommendation to review the 2021 Office of Sustainability Work Plan, provide input to staff, and forward to the City Council for approval.Commissioner Gaytan joined the meeting.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke;
